public interface IInventorySlot

Properties

IsEmpty

Whether an IItem is assigned to this IInventorySlot with a Quantity not equal 0.

bool IsEmpty { get; }

Property Value

bool

IsFull

Check if the Quantity greater than or equal to the assigned IItems ItemSO.maxStackAmount.

bool IsFull { get; }

Property Value

bool

Item

Get IItem assigned to this IInventorySlot.

IItem Item { get; }

Property Value

IItem

Quantity

Get quantity of Item in this IInventorySlot.

int Quantity { get; }

Property Value

int

Remarks

Quantity is limited by ItemSO.maxStackAmount, which is enforced in TryAddQuantity.
